description: This header file provides helper functions for managing context in a Rbus-based application, including functions for initializing and releasing context, converting paths, managing row contexts, and handling dynamic table synchronization.

methods.name: Context_Init
methods.description: Initialize the context helper API, maintaining a reference count for safe repeated calls.

methods.name: Context_Release
methods.description: Release the context helpers, should be called once for each Context_Init call.

methods.name: ConvertPath
methods.description: Convert a path with row aliases to a path with instance numbers only.

methods.name: GetParentContext
methods.description: Get the row context for a parameter inside a row.

methods.name: GetRowContext
methods.description: Get the context of a row given its path.

methods.name: SetRowContext
methods.description: Set the context for a new row along with its instance number and optional alias.

methods.name: RemoveRowContextByInstNum
methods.description: Remove the context of a row by its table name and instance number.

methods.name: RemoveRowContextByName
methods.description: Remove the context of a row by its full name.

methods.name: IsTimeToSyncDynamicTable
methods.description: Determine if it's appropriate to sync handlers for a dynamic table at this time.

methods.name: GetParamName
methods.description: Get the leaf parameter name from a full path.

methods.name: GetHandlerContext
methods.description: Retrieve a handler context for a specific element name.

ctags.name: fullName
ctags.pattern: /^    char const* fullName;   \/*full name of element with any table alias converted to instance n/

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^    char const* name;       \/*leaf name of element*\/$/

ctags.name: userData
ctags.pattern: /^    void* userData;         \/*any context data set for the this element's containing object (e./
